content: **knitted jacket in drops alpaca the piece is worked top down with raglan and i-cord sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-1034 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s-m-l-xl-xxl-xxxl **yarn** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-350-350-400-450-500 g colour 9020 light pearl grey **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **buttons** drops buttons no 629 6-6-6-6-7-7 items **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
